typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		col1 as integer,
		load_dt as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> source
source(output(
		sg_key as integer,
		col1 as integer,
		load_start_dt as timestamp,
		load_end_dt as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table',
	staged: false) ~> lkp
source, lkp lookup(source@col1 == lkp@col1,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> LookupTGT
LookupTGT select(mapColumn(
		col1 = source@col1,
		load_dt,
		sg_key,
		col_tgt = lkp@col1,
		load_start_dt,
		load_end_dt
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectRow
